subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The United States was host to a highly successful World Cup in 1994 and Women’s World Cups in 1999 and 2003, and has more large, modern stadiums than any other country in the world.
snippet: The United States was host to a highly successful World Cup in 1994 and Women’s World Cups in 1999 and 2003, and has more large, modern stadiums than any other country in the world.
